title: Conflict on the Road to Modernity with Paul VanderKlay
description:
I was wondering why people like Christians but not the Church...@Paul VanderKlay gives me some answers. Well not quite answers, more like further questions

Click on Paul's name to check out his channel

follow me on twitter @andrealynnlewis 
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
check out my vintage fashions insta on Instagram @vintage_bangs
